mapper.insert: insert into admin_board values(seq_admin_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, default, default, default, default, #{writer})
mapper.select: select count(*) from admin_board where admin_board_status = 'Y'

select board_no, title, content, a.create_date, a.update_date, views, admin_board_status, writer, member_nickname from admin_board a join member m on(writer=member_no) where admin_board_status = 'Y' order by create_date desc
select board_no, title, content from admin_board where admin_board_status = 'Y' and board_no = #{id}
mapper.update: update admin_board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, update_date=sysdate where board_no=#{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE member_name LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
select board_no, title, member_no, member_nickname from board b join member m using(member_no) where board_status='Y'

select * from board b join member m on(b.member_no = m.member_no) where board_status='Y'
and title like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
and content like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
and member_nickname like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
and (title like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' or content like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%')
SELECT TRUNC(create_date) as create_date, COUNT(*) as count FROM board WHERE board_status = 'Y' GROUP BY TRUNC(create_date) ORDER BY TRUNC(create_date) DESC
SELECT TRUNC(visit_date) as visit_date, COUNT(*) as count FROM visit_logs GROUP BY TRUNC(visit_date) ORDER BY TRUNC(visit_date) DESC

SELECT TO_CHAR(visit_date, 'DY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN') AS week_day_name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM visit_logs WHERE visit_date BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') - 7 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') - 1 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(visit_date, 'DY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN'), TO_CHAR(visit_date, 'D') ORDER BY DECODE(TO_CHAR(visit_date, 'D'), '2', 1, '3', 2, '4', 3, '5', 4, '6', 5, '7', 6, '1', 7)
